ygData.subject: MSRP
ygData.msgSnippet: I am by no means condoning price fixing, however, i would like to know at what price are you selling compasses.  It costs a bit over 3pp to make (I haven t
ygData.messageBody:
I am by no means condoning price fixing, however, i would like to know at
what price are you selling compasses. It costs a bit over 3pp to make (I
haven't failed yet..knock on wood). I'm currently selling for 5 pp, most
people who want one have no problem paying the 5 pp. I have found some
people who will only pay 4pp, to whom I tell to come back to me when you
get a bit more frustrated hitting sense heading. However, I do manage to
sell one, maybe two a day. I here that you can buy compasses from gypsies
in North Karana but I haven't made the trip to check it out (last time I
was there i got mauled by a grif). I also heard you could get them in
Kithicor forest but I went through all the shops and didn't find any. I'll
go to the gypsies and check them out then head to lavastorm to see if they
have them also.
